Description: Since the Laravel documentation does not provide how to check for memory leaks, many developers will opt in to use the Laravel debug bar but i found out that the debug bar it has a memory leak, so displaying the memory usage as well as the duration will help to easy spot, memory leaks without external tools.
Description Abstract: Since the Laravel documentation does not provide how to check for memory leaks, many developers will opt in to use the Laravel debug bar but i found out that the debug bar it has a memory leak, so displaying the memory usage as well as the duration will help to easy spot, memory leaks without external tools.
